title: RAINBOW TOYFROG Interlocking Gears Toys for Kids - 100 Piece Kit with Tote - Colorful Manipulatives for Preschool Sensory Bin Or Occupational Therapy Tools - STEM Building Toys for Girls & Boys
features: HELPS FINE MOTOR DEVELOPMENT & COORDINATION:Use your fine motor muscles to snap together and explore your wild imagination! Put all pieces into the cute bag to keep all the gears together.
STEM ACTIVITIES: 100 Pcs Gear Interlocking Building Set - Includes 10 different colors & 10 for each color. It's enough to share with friends.

A FUTURE ENGINEER’S STARTER PACK:IMPROVES MEMORY, CONCENTRATION, MANUAL DEXTERITY, hand-eye coordination, color recognition, sorting, increases attention and focus. This is a great interactive toy from toddlers to Alzheimers patients.

SAFE & PERFECT FORFOR LITTLE GIRLS & BOYS:These colorful blocks are the perfect gift for every little kid, regardless of gender! Our interlocking blocks are totally safe for your child to play and experiment with.It is the best Christmas gift sets for children.
A FUN TOY THAT TEACH: Kids Learns while they play! Pattern book included, Teaches children color sorting , shape matching and higher level matching.
description: A Toddler Activity To Enhance Fine Motor Skills! The best part is that your little ones won't even notice that they are learning as they play . Get your little engineers building! The set contains 100 sturdy pieces that snap together, challenging your child's creativity. Children discover something new every time they play. The gears in this colorful set offer hundreds of 3-D construction possibilities. Encourage Problem Solving and Perserverance provides many opportunities for young children to experiment with simple mechanics and science. CHRISTMAS GIFT for kids
